default.title: Clock Cycle Accelerator
default.description: +1 tick per second per level of upgrade.

default.title: Overpressure Fission
default.description: Cells produce more power at high heat. +1% per level at 1k heat, +2% at 2m heat, etc.

default.title: Heat Control Operator
default.description: Reactor stops auto-cooling when below max heat. Makes Forceful Fusion easier to maintain.

default.title: Smart Coolant Regulator
default.description: Outlets only output heat that connected vents can handle.

default.title: Coolant Flow Calibration
default.description: Venting manually is 10x as effective per level of upgrade.

default.title: Containment Metallurgy
default.description: Plating holds 100% more heat per level of upgrade.

default.title: Grid Transformer Tuning
default.description: Sells 1% of your power each tick per level of upgrade.

default.title: Electrode Material Refinement
default.description: Capacitors hold +100% power and heat per level of upgrade.

default.title: Perpetual Capacitors
default.description: Destroyed capacitors on cool surfaces are automatically replaced at 10x their cost. Their contained heat is vented directly into the reactor.

default.title: Coolant Formulation Enrichment
default.description: Coolant cells hold 100% more heat per level of upgrade.

default.title: Reflector Density Compaction
default.description: Reflectors last 100% longer per level of upgrade.

default.title: Neutron Mirror Polishing
default.description: Reflectors generate an additional 1% power per level of upgrade.

default.title: Perpetual Reflectors
default.description: Destroyed reflectors on a cool surface are automatically replaced at 1.5x their cost.

default.title: Enhanced Thermal Conductivity
default.description: Heat Exchangers, Inlets and Outlets hold and exchange 100% more heat per level of upgrade

default.title: Reinforced Heat Exchangers
default.description: Each plating increases the amount of heat that exchangers can exchange by 1% per level of upgrade per level of plating.

default.title: Active Exchangers
default.description: Each capacitor increases the amount of heat that exchangers can exchange by 1% per level of upgrade per level of capacitor.

default.title: Thermal Emission Coating
default.description: Vents hold and vent 100% more heat per level of upgrade.

default.title: Structural Heatsink Integration
default.description: Each plating increases the amount of heat that vents can vent by 1% per level of upgrade per level of plating.

default.title: Active Venting
default.description: Each capacitor increases the effectiveness of heat that vents can vent by 1% per level of upgrade per level of capacitor.

default.title: Expand Reactor Rows
default.description: Add one row to the reactor for each level of the upgrade.

default.title: Expand Reactor Cols
default.description: Add one column to the reactor for each level of the upgrade.

default.title: Laboratory
default.description: Enables experimental upgrades.

default.title: Infused Cells
default.description: Cells produce 100% more power.

default.title: Unleashed Cells
default.description: Cells produce 100% more power and heat.

default.title: Protium Cells
default.description: Allows you to use protium cells.

default.title: Quantum Buffering
default.description: Capacitors and platings provide twice as much reactor power and heat capacity, and capacitors can contain twice as much heat per level of upgrade.

default.title: Full Spectrum Reflectors
default.description: Reflectors gain an additional 100% of their base power reflection per level of upgrade.

default.title: Fluid Hyperdynamics
default.description: Heat vents, exchangers, inlets and outlets are two times as effective per level of upgrade.

default.title: Fractal Piping
default.description: Heat vents and exchangers hold two times their base heat per level of upgrade.

default.title: Ultracryonics
default.description: Coolant cells hold two times their base heat per level of upgrade.

default.title: Zero-Point Core
default.description: Increase the base heat and power storage of the reactor by four times per level of upgrade.

default.title: Unstable Protium
default.description: Protium cells last half as long and produce twice as much power and heat per level.

default.title: Heat Reflection
default.description: Allows you to use Thermal Neutron Reflectors. When purchased, the EP cost of other experimental part upgrades increases.

default.title: Experimental Capacitance
default.description: Allows you to use Extreme Capacitors. When purchased, the EP cost of other experimental part upgrades increases.

default.title: Vortex Cooling
default.description: Allows you to use Extreme Vents. When purchased, the EP cost of other experimental part upgrades increases.

default.title: Subterranean Heat Sink
default.description: Allows you to use Extreme Heat Exchangers. When purchased, the EP cost of other experimental part upgrades increases.

default.title: Vortex Extraction
default.description: Allows you to use Extreme Heat Inlets. When purchased, the EP cost of other experimental part upgrades increases.

default.title: Explosive Ejection
default.description: Allows you to use Extreme Heat Outlets. When purchased, the EP cost of other experimental part upgrades increases.

default.title: Thermionic Conversion
default.description: Allows you to use Thermionic Coolant Cells. When purchased, the EP cost of other experimental part upgrades increases.

default.title: Micro Capacitance
default.description: Allows you to use Charged Reactor Plating. When purchased, the EP cost of other experimental part upgrades increases.

default.title: Singularity Harnessing
default.description: Allows you to use Black Hole Particle Accelerators. When purchased, the EP cost of other experimental part upgrades increases.

default.title: Accelerator Heat Throughput
default.description: Increase the maximum heat that Particle Accelerators can use to create Exotic Particles by 100% per level of upgrade.

default.title: Black Hole Particle Accelerator Heat Throughput
default.description: Increase the maximum heat that Black Hole Particle Accelerators can use to create Exotic Particles by 100% per level of upgrade.
